sources.title: Wild Boys (1994) Madrid’s underworld burns hotter than stolen diamonds
sources.description:
Fresh out of the slammer, Tony and his crew Rafa and Nano dive back into Madrid’s underworld, spinning reckless heists until a botched jewelry job sparks a fiery clash with the law. As bullets fly and dangerous alliances crumble, Tony’s fiery lover Maika battles to pull him from the brink—before their dreams shatter faster than a stolen diamond.

Original title: Cautivos de la sombra
Alternative title: Wild Boys

Uncensored version: https://youtu.be/lgPXAvLB1EU

Director: Javier Elorrieta
Writers: Santiago Moncada and José Luis de Tomás

Main cast:
Manuel Bandera — Tony
Beatriz Santana — Maika
Neus Asensi — Blanca
Antonio Flores — Rafa
María Elena Nieto — Maite
Ramón Lillo — Crespo
Tony Isbert — Don José María
Manuel Zarzo — Padre de Maika

Genres: Spanish cinema, Crime, Drama
Release date: April 29, 1994 
Filming location: Spain.

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: After serving time and leaving prison, three friends resume to their criminal activities.
metadata.Writer: Santiago Moncada, José Luis de Tomás
metadata.Actors: Manuel Bandera, Beatriz Santana, Neus Asensi
